ranking.description: A Claude Code plugin that automatically captures everything Claude does during your coding sessions, compresses it with AI (using Claude's agent-sdk), and injects relevant context back into future sessions.
ranking.description_ja: A Claude Code plugin that automatically captures everything Claude does during your coding sessions, compresses it with AI (using Claude's agent-sdk), and injects relevant context back into future sessions.

ranking.readme_summary: Agent Skills Agent Skills are folders of instructions, scripts, and resources that AI agents can discover and use to perform at specific tasks. Write once, use everywhere. Codex uses skills to help package capabilities that teams and individuals can use to complete specific tasks in a repeatable way
ranking.readme_summary_ja: Agent Skills Agent Skills are folders of instructions, scripts, and resources that AI agents can discover and use to perform at specific tasks. Write once, use everywhere. Codex uses skills to help package capabilities that teams and individuals can use to complete specific tasks in a repeatable way

ranking.description: An agentic skills framework & software development methodology that works.
ranking.description_ja: An agentic skills framework & software development methodology that works.
ranking.readme_summary: Superpowers Superpowers is a complete software development workflow for your coding agents, built on top of a set of composable "skills" and some initial instructions that make sure your agent uses them. How it works It starts from the moment you fire up your coding agent. As soon as it sees that you're building something, it *doesn't* just jump into trying to write code
ranking.readme_summary_ja: Superpowers Superpowers is a complete software development workflow for your coding agents, built on top of a set of composable "skills" and some initial instructions that make sure your agent uses them. How it works It starts from the moment you fire up your coding agent. As soon as it sees that you're building something, it *doesn't* just jump into trying to write code

ranking.description: An autonomous agent for deep financial research
ranking.description_ja: An autonomous agent for deep financial research
ranking.readme_summary: Dexter ü§ñ Dexter is an autonomous financial research agent that thinks, plans, and learns as it works. It performs analysis using task planning, self-reflection, and real-time market data. Think Claude Code, but built specifically for financial research
ranking.readme_summary_ja: Dexter ü§ñ Dexter is an autonomous financial research agent that thinks, plans, and learns as it works. It performs analysis using task planning, self-reflection, and real-time market data. Think Claude Code, but built specifically for financial research

ranking.description: The best ChatGPT that $100 can buy.
ranking.description_ja: The best ChatGPT that $100 can buy.
ranking.readme_summary: nanochat !nanochat logo !scaling laws nanochat is the simplest experimental harness for training LLMs. It is designed to run on a single GPU node, the code is minimal/hackable, and it covers all major LLM stages including tokenization, pretraining, finetuning, evaluation, inference, and a chat UI. For example, you can train your own GPT-2 capability LLM (which cost ~$50,000 to train in 2019) for only $73 (3 hours of 8XH100 GPU node) and then talk to it in a familiar ChatGPT-like web UI
ranking.readme_summary_ja: nanochat !nanochat logo !scaling laws nanochat is the simplest experimental harness for training LLMs. It is designed to run on a single GPU node, the code is minimal/hackable, and it covers all major LLM stages including tokenization, pretraining, finetuning, evaluation, inference, and a chat UI. For example, you can train your own GPT-2 capability LLM (which cost ~$50,000 to train in 2019) for only $73 (3 hours of 8XH100 GPU node) and then talk to it in a familiar ChatGPT-like web UI

ranking.description: The official source code repository for the calibre ebook manager
ranking.description_ja: The official source code repository for the calibre ebook manager
ranking.readme_summary: calibre calibre is an e-book manager. It can view, convert, edit and catalog e-books in all of the major e-book formats. It can also talk to e-book reader devices
ranking.readme_summary_ja: calibre calibre is an e-book manager. It can view, convert, edit and catalog e-books in all of the major e-book formats. It can also talk to e-book reader devices

ranking.readme_summary: Maestro ![Made with Maestro](https://github.com/pedramamini/Maestro) ![Discord](https://runmaestro.ai/discord) ![User Docs](https://docs.runmaestro.ai/) > Maestro hones fractured attention into focused intent. Maestro is a cross-platform desktop app for orchestrating your fleet of AI agents and projects. It's a high-velocity solution for hackers who are juggling multiple projects in parallel
